TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mahavun, title = Mahavun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahavun} }

S.FORM: alang Mahavun (Mamahavunna, 久美部落) ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Sin'iy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 256 buwan, 943 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 88% kyan ku 830 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 12% kyan ku 113 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 69%, Cou 15%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Mahavun hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Mahavun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Mahavun hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Mahavun hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Mahavun hya' ga Halusipun. tay mkyahu' na Mahavun hya' ga Kalibuan. tay 'llaw na Mahavun hya' ga Qalipusungan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Mahavon (Mamahavonna, 久美部落) ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Sin'iy go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 256 bowan, 943 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 88% kyan ko 830 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 12% kyan ko 113 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 69%, Coo 15%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Mahavon hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Mahavon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Mahavon hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Mahavon hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Mahavon hya' ga Halosipon. tay mkyaho' na Mahavon hya' ga Kaliboan. tay 'llaw na Mahavon hya' ga Qaliposongan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
